title: The default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value was not set in the list box of the report parameter. After modifying the default value, the OK button can still be used.
EB: The list box should retain the default value even after modifying it. The OK button should be disabled after step 5.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. [Incomplete]
